about.label: About Me
about.title: Creative problem solver
about.description1: Results-driven Digital Marketing & Creative Specialist with expertise in website management, SEO, Google Ads, social media marketing, photography, and videography.
about.description2: Skilled in developing, executing, and analyzing data-driven marketing strategies that increase brand visibility and drive measurable results. Experienced in managing multiple brands such as @corechamps, @musclerulz, @prosciencenutra and @jnknutrition, handling full digital operations from content design and video production to ad campaign optimization and web maintenance.

milestones.title: The Beginning
milestones.description: Started my journey as a young student with a gifted laptop. Little did I know it would change everything.

milestones.title: Learning Photoshop
milestones.description: In a modest village studio, I learned Photoshop. Late nights, small screens, but endless passion.

milestones.title: Smartphone Era
milestones.description: Transitioned to mobile editing. Instagram was exploding. Creative opportunities everywhere.

milestones.title: First Breakthrough
milestones.description: Freelance work started flowing in. Built my first real client base. The grind was paying off.

milestones.title: Viral Moment
milestones.description: Created a Facebook frame that reached 2M+ users. This was the validation I needed.

milestones.title: Agency & Business
milestones.description: Opened a small marketing agency in Bangladesh. Started a product printing business. The dream was real.

milestones.title: COVID Collapse
milestones.description: The pandemic hit hard. Everything shut down. Family pressure was immense. But we had to keep moving.

milestones.title: The Big Leap
milestones.description: After selling the family cow, I came to Dubai. A difficult decision, but necessary for growth.

milestones.title: First Job in Dubai
milestones.description: Got my first job after 1 month 17 days in a new country. Felt like a victory.

milestones.title: Today
milestones.description: Creative direction at JNK Nutrition. Building brands. Creating impact. Living the dream.
